job.description: **C2C or Sponsorship is NOT available for this position** Job Title: Sr. Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) Job Type: Permanent/Direct Hire Job Location: Marietta, GA - The client is still working remote, but will eventually move to a hybrid work schedule. Candidates based in Atlanta are preferred. Target years of Experience: 4+ years of engineering experience Top 3-5 Skillsets: Experience with AWS (The client is migrating to AWS right now). Senior level Linux administration experience Programming experience with Bash, Python, Ruby, Go, Java, or C/C++ Experience building CI/CD & deployment pipelines Preferred: Kubernetes experience What this job is: Building automation of: Infrastructure Configuration Deployment of infrastructure Build/Test/Deploy/Release of code Maintain log shipping best practices, including tagging, tracing, alerting and analysis tools. Build and maintain pipelines for CI, CD and deployment. Writing Infrastructure as code (Terraform) Tech Stack: Linux, Chef, Puppet, Terraform, Jenkins, AWS. Team Dynamics: Agile environment.
